text: Ara apanara age'o aneka rasulera upara mithyaropa kara hayechila; kintu tadera upara mithyaropa kara o kasta deyara para'o tara dhairya dharana karechila, ye paryanta na amadera sahayya tadera kache eseche [1]. Ara allahâ€Œra banisamuhera kono paribartanakari ne'i. Ara abasya'i rasulaganera kichu sambada apanara kache eseche
